description:
In Central Grass Area - follow in clockwise direction commencing adjacent to pedestrian gate adjacent to No 11 Prior Bolton Street 
T1 -(T9 of LBI (No.299) 2007)  Sycamore - Crown lift by 2m and prune to give 2m clearance from flats 
T2 - (T8 of LBI (No.299) 2007)Horse Chestnut - Crown reduce by 20% due to vertical crack on north stem 
T3 - (T7 of LBI (No.299) 2007) Sycamore - Crown lift south side by 2m 
T4 - (T4 & T5  of LBI (No.299) 2007) Lime x 2 - Remove truncal suckers and deadwood 
T5 - (T5 of LBI (No.299) 2007) Fastigiate Hornbeam - Crown lift by 3m secondary branches only 
T6 - (T12 & T13 of LBI (No.299) 2007) Lime & Sycamore - Crown lift by 3m; crown thin by 20% 
T9 - (T16 of LBI (No.299) 2007)Oak - Crown lift by 3m; crown thin by 20% 
T12 - Foxglove Tree - Remove deadwood 

Compton Street - from north to south 
Lime x 3 - (T1,T2 & T3 of LBI (No.299) 2007) Crown lift by 3m; prune to give 2m clearance from flats and de sucker Sycamore - Crown lift by 2m over road 
Plane x 4 - (T2,T3,T7 & T8 of LBI (No.301) 2007) Crown lift over road by 3m and flats by 2m; crown thin by 20% Lime - Crown lift by 2m and de sucker 
Cherry - Prune back from flats
